description:
"Croc's World Run" is the newest part of the Croc's World franchise!

It features:
+ 50 incredible levels 
+ Nice HD-Graphics
+ 4 different Worlds
+ many challenging enemies
+ easy one-button-control

Instructions:
1. Croc runs automatically!
2. Try to avoid all enemies or jump on them (donÂ´t try it with the hedgehog or the mean fish)! 
3. Just press B to jump!
name: Croc's World Run
